creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell
description: tankard, slightly tapered, cylindrical plain body, flat cover with serrated front edge, and solid scroll billet, 'S' scrolled handle with fine hinge and beaded ornament in relief; reeded base
markings:
below the hinge, engraved: [PC-EC-ML]; on the lower part: [LED-MES-CHLS.1891] 
maker\'s mark stamped to left of handle below rim: [SS] (thin crude capitals in a square)
title: Tankard
